sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.0%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 2.4% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Pfizer ( PFE ), trading down 2.0%.
Pfizer is showing a gain of 3.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Johnson & Johnson ( JNJ ), trading down 1.1%, and JPMorgan Chase & Co. ( JPM ), trading up 1.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
